mapper.select:
SELECT tu.*, (SELECT OU FROM TB_ORG trg WHERE trg.OU_CODE = tu.OU_CODE) AS OU FROM TB_USER tu
ORDER BY tu.ORDR

SELECT tu.*, IFNULL(tr.ROLE_CD,'ROLE_USER') AS ROLE_CD, (SELECT OU FROM TB_ORG trg WHERE trg.OU_CODE = tu.OU_CODE) AS OU, IFNULL((SELECT NICK_NAME FROM TB_USER_NICK_NAME tun WHERE tun.SID = #{sid}),tu.DISPLAY_NAME) AS NICK_NAME FROM TB_USER tu LEFT JOIN TB_ROLE tr on tu.SID = tr.SID WHERE tu.SID = #{sid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER (SID, UID, OU_CODE, PARENT_OU_CODE, TOP_OU_CODE, OU, DISPLAY_NAME, USER_FULL_NAME, ORDR, POSITION_CODE, POSITION) VALUES (#{sid}, #{uid}, #{ouCode}, #{parentOuCode}, #{topOuCode}, #{ou}, #{displayName}, #{userFullName}, #{ordr}, #{positionCode}, #{position}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE UID = #{uid}, OU_CODE = #{ouCode}, PARENT_OU_CODE = #{parentOuCode}, TOP_OU_CODE = #{topOuCode}, OU = #{ou}, DISPLAY_NAME = #{displayName}, USER_FULL_NAME = #{userFullName}, ORDR = #{ordr}, POSITION_CODE = #{positionCode}, POSITION = #{position}
mapper.select: SELECT tr.*, (SELECT DISPLAY_NAME FROM TB_USER tu WHERE tu.SID = tr.SID) AS DISPLAY_NAME, (SELECT OU FROM TB_ORG trg WHERE trg.OU_CODE = (SELECT OU_CODE FROM TB_USER tu WHERE tu.SID = tr.SID)) AS OU, CASE WHEN tr.ROLE_CD = 'ROLE_ADMIN' THEN '시스템 관리자' WHEN tr.ROLE_CD = 'ROLE_KNOWLEDGE' THEN '지식 관리자' WHEN tr.ROLE_CD = 'ROLE_SURVEY' THEN '설문 관리자' WHEN tr.ROLE_CD = 'ROLE_COMMUNITY' THEN '커뮤니티 관리자' WHEN tr.ROLE_CD = 'ROLE_ORG' THEN '부서 지식 관리자' END AS ROLE_NM FROM TB_ROLE tr
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ROLE (SID, ROLE_CD, REGISTER_ID, REGIST_DTM, UPDATER_ID, UPD_DTM, DEL_YN) VALUES (#{sid}, #{roleCd}, #{registerId}, SYSDATE(), #{registerId}, SYSDATE(), 'N')
INSERT INTO TB_USER_NICK_NAME (SID, NICK_NAME) VALUES (#{sid}, #{nickName}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE NICK_NAME = #{nickName}
INSERT INTO TB_REQUEST_MANAGER (SID, REGIST_DTM) VALUES (#{sid}, SYSDATE())
mapper.select: SELECT trm.*, (SELECT DISPLAY_NAME FROM TB_USER tu WHERE tu.SID = trm.SID) AS DISPLAY_NAME, (SELECT OU FROM TB_ORG trg WHERE trg.OU_CODE = (SELECT OU_CODE FROM TB_USER tu WHERE tu.SID = trm.SID)) AS OU FROM TB_REQUEST_MANAGER trm
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ROLE (SID, ROLE_CD, REGISTER_ID, REGIST_DTM, UPDATER_ID, UPD_DTM, DEL_YN) VALUES (#{sid}, 'ROLE_ORG', #{registerId}, SYSDATE(), #{registerId}, SYSDATE(), 'N')
